website_summaries.verdict: This small, secure, UL-rated safe comes with a cart that makes it highly portable within your building. It's not lightweight enough for a thief to quickly steal.
pros: Includes wheel cart for improved portability
Fits a dozen or so file folders, passports, jewelry pieces, or other small valuables
cons: Accidentally lowering the lid with the locking mechanism in the wrong position could damage the lock

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking...
customer_reviews.text: While the structure of this chest is well made, there is no handle to carry it or move it without the wheels, and the wheel contraption is not sturdy, as you would hope. There is a lot of wiggle room between the chest and the cart, and the the nuts and bolts keep falling out of the cart. Additionally there is no handle to pull or push the cart so the only way to get this chest around is to shove it with your foot, and hope the bolts on the cart hold up. All that said, if you just want to plop this chest down on the ground and not move it anywhere...ever... the safe seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Honeywell Filing Safe
customer_reviews.text: Cheers for this large file box, a definite keeper for vital personal papers. It's extra wide to fit legal papers, and has thick interior walls to keep the elements out. The double locking system provides added security. Note that it's extremely heavy, and the wheel system is well worth the extra money. No one is casually walking out of your house with this fire box in tow!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best Safe for HOME!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love It!!! Best home safe!!! Wheels are a must!!! So easy to move around!! Very safe and roomie!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E Benson

customer_reviews.title: It's is a great safe it's just big enough for what I need ...
customer_reviews.text: It's is a great safe it's just big enough for what I need very easy to move around and easy to assemble the dolly just that the screws are very small I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is looking for a safe not to big or small
customer_reviews.author: W. Thibodeau

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF-NO WHEEL CART!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut safe out of carton. Found there is NO wheel cart. And this thing is HEAVY!!!! Now I can't return because I am not King Kong. AND I'm out the cost of the Wheel Cart that should have been included. DO NOT BUY UNLESS THEY GUARANTEE YOU WILL GET THE WHEEL CART.
customer_reviews.author: jimbo57

customer_reviews.title: Lock failed immediately
customer_reviews.text: The second time I put the key in the lock, it refused to come out, and the safe doesn't lock. After a thousand attempts to jiggle the key every which way to either get it out or move the lock mechanism, I have given up. Otherwise seems like it could be a nice product, but because of the poor lock quality, it is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: --Jason--

customer_reviews.title: Key broke the first time I tried to lock the safe.
customer_reviews.text: The key broke the first time I tried to lock the chest. I have not put together the other one. I guess I will have to call a lock smith to fix the key problem. Safe nice key cheap.
customer_reviews.author: mjppaci

customer_reviews.title: WHERE ARE THE KEYS?
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to get my cabinet HOWEVER the dolly it sits on (otherwise you can't move it) was finicky to put together (16 SMALL screws with bolts) and then only to discover NO KEYS!!!!! Of course due to the corono virus no one is answering at the company so I'm waiting for a reply to my email!! ughhhhhh
customer_reviews.author: luney31059

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy box. recommend getting wheeled cart too
customer_reviews.text: Well-packaged. Arrived in mint condition, without dents. Heavy, solid box. Key doesn't slide into the lock smoothly as other reviewers have stated. Cannot be left unlocked unless key is inside the lock. The box is heavy, as expected. No handle yet indentations on either side's under surface makes lifting the box pretty easy. I'm optimistic. My box came with the wheeled cart - though this required assembly. 16 small screws with 7 mm nut. Small size but good quality hardware. Rolls smoothly on flat surface and sturdy enough for this heavy box.
customer_reviews.author: Robert, Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: After spending quite a bit of money and lot of frustration on trying to find a great lock box that protects against fire and water. This safe is quite roomy and can hold many things and the MAIN thing I love about it is the fact that you don't have to lift it (as with many other boxes), but you roll it anywhere you want. I LOVE IT and thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Get in sale if you can.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when on sale at a very low price. It is incredibly sturdy. Easy to roll around on the base. Latches are plastic and seem kind of cheap. But I’m careful with them and they work fine. I love it. Feel very confident that if there was a fire or flood my contents would be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Replace Fire Safe That Was Not Mobile
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fire safe mostly because of the wheel based. The previous safe I had safe and I had to keep moving to use or get it out my way. This product solved that problem and sits in a convenient location that I can roll out to get to the records that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos from FL

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs handles on the lid
customer_reviews.text: I like the safe. It is a good size and holds hanging files perfectly. My only complain is NO HANDLE on the lid which makes it hard to open as the lid is so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great look and so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is great, but I do not like the fact that it is very small inside. I have a lot of legal size documents that I will not be able to fit in there.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Quevedo

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Work nice. Arrived scratched, as heavy as it is I expected it to be a little battered. These shipping companies don't handle heavy items nicely. I used to work at ups packing trucks. No one cared how you handled the packages. Not even management.
customer_reviews.author: Your name (victim)

customer_reviews.title: Using it mainly for fire protection of documents
customer_reviews.text: Obviously an intruder can just take it with them (even though heavy for me), but my purpose for the purchase is only to protect documents from fire.
customer_reviews.author: Teri, s2bs, fd

customer_reviews.title: Need Tools to Assemble Cart
customer_reviews.text: Just received the filing box, and it appears to be exactly as described. I'm confident the box will meet our needs. One suggestion: The description should also describe the tools you'll need to assemble the cart: a Phillips screwdriver and a 9/32 wrench. Assembly isn't difficult as long as you have the tools; they aren't included.
customer_reviews.author: Cellon

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. It does not turn well, so getting in and out of doors can be a small challenge. The wheels are very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M. Boatright

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and roomy. No more rolling up documents to fit it into my old fire safe. Looks and works just like a filing cabinet inside.
customer_reviews.author: StudioVRM

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the fire protection that I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something strong and fireproof that just keeps the paperwork and documents "safe". Great size and rolls good on carpet. Key is taped to directions.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Happy shopper.

customer_reviews.title: Nice safe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice safe for the price. Better get the ones with the wheels because this thing is heavy. Got personal papers and a backup hard drive inside. Plenty of room inside
customer_reviews.author: FRANK VITAMANTE

customer_reviews.title: CHECK PACKAGE!! RIGHT AWAY
customer_reviews.text: The order was missing a wheel which I just found out. We were unable to unpack until now. Not sure how to resolve at this point. Will contact manuafacturer
customer_reviews.author: lmt2094

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, sturdy, seems like it is well built. Hopefully won’t have to test it’s fireproof capabilities any time soon
customer_reviews.author: Julie Romano

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping.  Seems to be a solid product
customer_reviews.text: Hope to never need it, but glad that I have it
customer_reviews.author: tmills

customer_reviews.title: Really nice safe
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, heavy duty and very happy with my purchase. No problems with keys. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wnyer

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Love the fact that it has wheels ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Love the fact that it has wheels and that makes it easy to move, if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: DebMc

customer_reviews.title: Cool safe
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift , they love it . I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Love using file organizer for easy retrieval and surprised how ...
customer_reviews.text: Now have all important papers protected. Love using file organizer for easy retrieval and surprised how much it holds.
customer_reviews.author: Set2go

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and plenty of room for documents. Exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Barker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice safe. Got it for personal documents for potential fire and decent security.
customer_reviews.author: Dale D.

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious and love the ability to roll it around
customer_reviews.text: Had plenty of room for my external hard drive, as well as important files and paperwork. It is incredibly useful having the rollers for moving it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki soelberg

customer_reviews.title: It has a removable wheeled frame for easy moving.
customer_reviews.text: It is great for hanging file folders. Very heavy and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: SIZE
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I need to store my documents and I really like it's maneuverable.
customer_reviews.author: sue p.

customer_reviews.title: keys?
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday - and there were no keys - and the safe is locked. Where are the keys?
customer_reviews.author: Delora B.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and safe but very convenient to move
customer_reviews.text: It is a ideal safe box for keeping important personal docs
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: poorly made lock and cheap keys. spend the extra to get a long lasting safe!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Wright

customer_reviews.title: I placed our passports, social security cards, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I placed our passports, social security cards, and birth certificates in here. Three months later I went to add some photographs and I discovered our passports had completely molded over and parts of our other documents as well. Everything felt damp. What a hassle this was. There should be some warning with this product telling customers to buy those packets that absorb moisture to put in with the saw. Jd you live in a moist climate BUY MOISTURE ABSORBING PACKETS to put in here!
customer_reviews.author: Ender

product_meta.title: Honeywell Safes & Door Locks - Honeywell Safes & Door Locks Fire Waterproof Filing Safe Box Chest with Wheel Cart 1106W, Medium
product_meta.description: This fire safe box has a 30-minute UL fire protection rating for up to 1550°f and a 24 hour waterproof seal that has been verified to keep contents dry, even when submerged 39 inches underwater. The safe comes with a convenient wheel cart for easy transportation, and 2 entry keys for added security so that you can give access to one other person, in case one of the keys is lost. Our fireproof, waterproof safes are also perfect gifts for fathers day, Christmas or birthday gifts for those who need a file safe or a dorm safe to protect electronic media (USB drives, hard drives cd’s, mobile phones, dvd’s), personal documents, or valuables. The safe comes with an industry-leading 7-year limited warranty, which includes a lifetime after fire replacement guarantee. The exterior dimensions are 15.7 in h x 16.9 in W x 12.8 in D. The interior dimensions are 10.1 in h x 12.2 in W x 8.5 in D. This chest weighs 49.8 lbs. lh licensed products, inc. Leverages premium consumer brand power to deliver innovative solutions for unmet and emerging consumer needs around the world. Our products are currently available in over 70 countries across the globe. LH licensed products, inc. Is the exclusive licensee and manufacturer of Honeywell Safes, paper shredders and door locks. Our partner company, Lewis hyman inc. Began in 1930 as a family window treatment business in new York city. Widely recognized for lifestyle product innovation, Lewis hyman inc. Has established a tradition of quality and service, spanning three generations and over eighty years of expertise. Use your Amazon gift card and search our other amazing products at our Amazon storefront.
feature_bullets: MOLDED CHESTS – Honeywell waterproof fire-resistant chests are perfect for the safe storage of letter and legal documents, USB Flash Drives, DVDs, CDs and more. Secure peace of mind with these chests’ ability to protect your digital media and sensitive documents from fire and water damage. Chests are available with a handle or as a cabinet. For security measures, this box has a key lock system and a 7-year limited warranty with a Lifetime After-Fire Replacement Guarantee.

FEATURES - This Fire Safe Box has a 30-Minute UL Fire protection rating for up to 1550°F and a 24 Hour waterproof seal that has been verified to keep contents dry, even when submerged 39 inches underwater. The safe comes with a convenient wheel cart for easy transportation, and 2 entry keys for added security so that you can give access to one other person, in case one of the keys is lost. The exterior dimensions are 15.7 in H x 16.9 in W x 12.8 in D.

QUALITY MADE – As a Honeywell brand licensee, we have a responsibility to conduct ourselves with the highest levels of integrity in everything we do. This helps us sustain the credibility of the brand, maintain the strong reputation, and build on our track record of growth and performance. From the shop floor to the boardroom, all Honeywell licensees and representatives are held to the highest standard and we exceed all laws and regulations in the countries where we do business.

SECURE - Honeywell Safes, Paper Shredders and Door Locks are manufactured and distributed exclusively by LH Licensed Products, Inc. These products provide security and safety for your important and irreplaceable documents and your most valuable personal possessions. We offer products that help deliver peace of mind by protecting your belongings against damage or loss in the event of fires, floods and other natural disasters as well as unauthorized intrusion and invasion of your home and office.

TRUSTED COMPANY - The Honeywell trademark is licensed from Honeywell International Inc., a Fortune 100 company that invents and manufactures technologies to address some of the world’s toughest challenges linked to global macro trends such as energy efficiency, clean energy generation, safety and security, globalization and customer productivity. Technology from Honeywell International Inc. is in 150 million homes and 10 million buildings worldwide.
